title: Universe Sandbox 2 - Alpha 18.2
description:
[center][img]http://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/230290/header.jpg?t=1432769359[/img]

[quote]Title: Universe Sandbox Â²
Genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation
Developer: Giant Army
Publisher: Giant Army	
Release Date: Summer 2015

<hr>[b]About This Game[/b]<hr>
 Universe Sandbox Â² is a physics based space simulator that merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. It's the long awaited sequel to the original Universe Sandbox.

<hr>[b]Key Features[/b]<hr>
    Material System - build planets out of Hydrogen, Iron, Rock, & Water
    Stellar evolution & supernovae
    Solar flares & volatile trails
    Procedurally generated stars & planets
    Light-warping black holes
    Simulated dark matter

<hr>[b]System Requirements[/b]<hr>
    Minimum:
        Processor: 1.6GHz dual core
        Memory: 1 GB RAM
        Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory, Shader Model 3.0
        DirectX: Version 9.0c
        Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
